## Properties

| Property            | Attribute            | Description           | Type      | Default   |
| ------------------- | -------------------- | --------------------- | --------- | --------- |
| `backgroundColour`  | `background-colour`  | Background colour     | `string`  | `'white'` |
| `horizontalPadding` | `horizontal-padding` | Horizontal padding    | `number`  | `3`       |
| `shadow`            | `shadow`             | Shadow                | `boolean` | `true`    |
| `spaceBelow`        | `space-below`        | Space below component | `number`  | `0`       |
| `verticalPadding`   | `vertical-padding`   | Vertical padding      | `number`  | `3`       |
